insert into love_system_auth (ID,CODE,NAME,CREATE_TIME,
MODIFY_TIME, STATUS,ISVALID,menu_id) values (#{id},#{code},#{name},#{createTime},
#{modifyTime}, #{status},#{isvalid},#{menuId})
mapper.select:
select distinct o.ID,o.CODE,o.NAME,o.CREATE_TIME,o.MODIFY_TIME,o.STATUS,o.ISVALID,o.menu_id,m.name as menuName from love_system_auth o,love_system_menu m where o.menu_id = m.id and o.STATUS !='DELETED'
and o.CODE like '%${code}%'
and o.NAME like '%${name}%'
and o.CODE like '${authType}%'
and m.id in #{item}
order by o.menu_id asc

and o.CODE like '%${code}%'

and m.id in #{item}
